target.name: edit
target.description: Switches to a change in order to start editing it

target.name: edit_module
target.description: Retrieves a module in order to start editing it

target.name: update_base
target.description: Updates base version of current change

target.name: update_base_continue
target.description: Continues updating base version of current change

target.name: update_base_cancel
target.description: Cancels updating base version of current change

target.name: update
target.description: Updates files from CVS (checks if the change is in an appropriate state)

target.name: update_all
target.description: Updates files from CVS, including non-editable modules

target.name: commit
target.description: Commits files to CVS (checks if th change is in an appropriate state)

target.name: end_edit
target.description: Finishes editing of current change, enlists it for reviewing

target.name: integrate
target.description: Starts integration build of a change

target.name: integrate_step
target.description: Continues integration of a change from step entered by integrator

target.name: upload_diff
target.description: Uploads diff without ending change to review the changes

target.name: add_checkpoint
target.description: Adds checkpoint to a current change

target.name: checkout_version
target.description: Checks out a version from repository

target.name: checkout_change
target.description: Checks out a change from repository
